title: #126 Now that's what I call Griefcast (part 5)
itunes:title: #126 Now that's what I call Griefcast (part 5)
itunes:subtitle: Hey griefsters, it's the last episode of the very strange year that is 2020, so we've revisited some of our beautiful episodes from this season, and rounded up some clips for you to listen to. As ever, the full episodes are all available to d...
description:
Hey griefsters, it's the last episode of the very strange year that is 2020, so we've revisited some of our beautiful episodes from this season, and rounded up some clips for you to listen to. As ever, the full episodes are all available to download from your normal pod shop. Thank you so much for listening this year, for tweeting, for getting in touch. never has this small corner of the pod universe felt more safe and needed.


Featuring clips from Adam Buxton, Candice Brathwaite, Monty Don, Jess Mills, Lee Lawrence, Sarah Brown, Robert Diament and Amanda Palmer.


You can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast

Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble. And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.
